name: tpfinal-computer-vision
description: Sistema de detección y análisis de video en tiempo real con IA

scripts.dev: docker-compose up -d && sleep 10 && npm run dev:services
scripts.dev:services: concurrently "npm run dev:session-store" "npm run dev:edge-agent" "npm run dev:attribute-enricher" "npm run dev:object-storage" "npm run dev:ui"
scripts.dev:minimal: docker-compose up -d postgres redis mediamtx && sleep 5 && concurrently "npm run dev:session-store" "npm run dev:object-storage" "npm run dev:ui"
scripts.start:prod: concurrently "npm run start --workspace=services/session-store" "npm run start --workspace=services/edge-agent" "npm run start --workspace=services/object-storage" "npm run start --workspace=services/attribute-enricher"
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:db && npm run setup:models
scripts.setup:db: docker compose up -d postgres && sleep 5 && cd services/session-store && npm run db:migrate
scripts.setup:models: mkdir -p ./models && curl -L -o ./models/yolov8n.onnx https://github.com/ultralytics/assets/releases/download/v8.0.0/yolov8n.onnx || echo 'Model download failed - will need manual download'
